an4.186:1.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4.186:1.2: “kena nu kho, bhante, loko nīyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasaṁ gacchatī”ti?
an4.186:2.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:2.4: ‘kena nu kho, bhante, loko nīyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasaṁ gacchatī’”ti?
an4.186:2.6: “Cittena kho, bhikkhu, loko nīyati, cittena parikassati, cittassa uppannassa vasaṁ gacchatī”ti.
an4.186:3.1: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttari pañhaṁ apucchi:
an4.186:3.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hotī”ti?
an4.186:4.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:4.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hotī’”ti?
an4.186:4.8: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthā, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4.186:4.9: Catuppadāya cepi, bhikkhu, gāthāya atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti bahussuto dhammadharoti alaṁvacanāyā”ti.
an4.186:5.1: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttari pañhaṁ apucchi:
an4.186:5.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī”ti?
an4.186:6.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:6.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī’”ti?
an4.186:6.7: “Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhuno ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati;
an4.186:6.8: ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati;
an4.186:6.9: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati;
an4.186:6.10: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati.
an4.186:6.11: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī”ti.
an4.186:7.1: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttari pañhaṁ apucchi:
an4.186:7.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī”ti?
an4.186:8.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:8.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī’”ti?
an4.186:8.7: “Idha, bhikkhu, paṇḍito mahāpañño nevattabyābādhāya ceteti na parabyābādhāya ceteti na ubhayabyābādhāya ceteti attahitaparahitaubhayahitasabbalokahitameva cintayamāno cinteti.
an4.186:8.8: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī”ti.
